# Python specific ignores
__pycache__/
*.pyc
*.pyd
.Python/
.ipynb_checkpoints/
.mypy_cache/
.pytest_cache/
.vscode/

# Environment ignores (if you create local environments inside project)
venv/
env/
conda_env/

# Common OS generated files
.DS_Store
Thumbs.db

# Logs and temporary files (already handled by LFS, but good to list)
*.log
*.tmp
*.bak
